title: Curse of the Golden Flower
synopsis: Director Yimou Zhang's lavish epic follows the romantic intrigue and political machinations in the house of the Emperor Ping and his ailing wife.

title: The Assassin
synopsis: A young woman who was kidnapped as a child and trained as an assassin faces a test of her loyalty when she is ordered to kill her cousin.

title: Infernal Affairs 3
synopsis: Former Triad member Ming sets out to uncover any remaining Triad moles within the police force, but his maverick style proves problematic.

title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
synopsis: Playing the hero first portrayed by Bruce Lee in Fist of Fury, Donnie Yen reprises his role as Chen Zhen in this breakneck kung fu thriller.

title: Kung Fu Yoga
synopsis: Two mismatched archaeologists battle a team of vicious mercenaries in a race to discover an ancient Tibetan treasure of unimaginable worth.

title: The Mermaid
synopsis: When egocentric tycoon Xuan's plans for a pristine ocean reserve threaten the merpeople living there, comely mermaid Shan is sent to ice him.

title: Secret
synopsis: Enchanted by a pretty pianist and the haunting melody she plays, a musical prodigy falls in love. But a secret soon threatens to derail their romance.

title: Assembly
synopsis: After leading an outnumbered unit against Kuomintang troops during the Chinese Civil War, Captain Gu must now fight to set the record straight.

title: Chinese Odyssey (Part I), A
synopsis: When the Goddess of Happiness tosses the Longevity Monk and his disciples out of heaven (because the Monkey King tried to attain immortality), the Monkey King is reincarnated as the Joker. He now spends his time chasing two jealous women.

title: Coming Home
synopsis: A dissident professor returns to his wife and daughter after years in a Cultural Revolution labor camp, only to find his family distant and broken.

title: Monster Hunt
synopsis: In a mythical land where monsters and humans coexist, a royal baby born to a mortal father and monster mother becomes the center of an epic adventure.

title: A Battle of Warriors
synopsis: In ancient China, a warlord sets his sights on conquering the city-state of Liang, where a lone warrior takes it upon himself to defend the residents.

title: Monkey King: Hero Is Back
synopsis: Released from his ice cage after centuries, a fallen but still quite mystical monkey warrior makes saving a village from monsters his first priority.

title: If You Are the One
synopsis: After striking it rich with an idiotic invention, Qin Fen turns to online dating to find a wife. His tagline? Only sincere ones need apply.

title: Big Fish and Begonia
synopsis: A girl from a mystical realm transforms into a dolphin to explore the human world, where an encounter with a young man propels her on a fateful quest.

title: The Monkey King 2
synopsis: After escaping the Mountain of Five Elements, the Monkey King accompanies the young monk who freed him on a dangerous quest to recover sacred scrolls.

title: Rise of the Legend
synopsis: To curry his crime boss's favor, an orphaned kung fu prodigy goes after a rival gang's leader. But the youth also has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

title: Ocean Heaven
synopsis: Sam Wong shares a contented life with his autistic son, David -- until Sam learns that he has a terminal illness that will soon leave David orphaned.

title: Animal World
synopsis: An unlucky, debt-ridden teen resorts to his math skills when he's forced into a deadly tournament of rock-paper-scissors run by a diabolical host.

title: Tiny Times
synopsis: Four recent college grads dream big and navigate the challenges that come with love, success and their photogenic, cosmopolitan lives in Shanghai.

title: Finding Mr. Right
synopsis: A Chinese tycoon's mistress flees to Seattle to have their baby out of the tabloid spotlight, and unexpectedly falls in love with her driver.

title: Persona
synopsis: A private investigation firm takes on sensitive cases while its uniquely skilled agents deal with issues both inside and out of the office.

title: The Bullet Vanishes
synopsis: At a bullet factory in '30s Shanghai, two detectives investigate a girl's death. But the boss undermines their work, and workers perish mysteriously.

title: Switch
synopsis: Thieves, cops, organized criminals and rollerblading assassins fight tooth and nail around the world for a valuable ancient painting.

title: Ultimate Beastmaster China
synopsis: Bin Gu and Qinyi Du host an intense obstacle course competition featuring world-class athletes from China and five other countries.

title: So Young
synopsis: This coming-of-age story follows a girl through college in 1990s China, where she forges intimate relationships and learns important life lessons.

title: Meteor Garden
synopsis: An ambitious college student from an ordinary family makes it to her dream university and encounters the F4, a quartet of popular, affluent young men.

title: The Great Magician
synopsis: In 1920s Beijing, a host of talented performers gather to show off their skills. The challenge: reproduce a magic trick called the Eight Immortals.

title: Forever Enthralled
synopsis: Follow the turbulent life of Peking opera legend Mei Lanfang in this lavish period biopic about Mei's rise to fame in China and then the world.

title: Monk Comes Down the Mountain
synopsis: In 1930s Hangzhou, a banished monk encounters wise masters who impart fantastic kung fu techniques, preparing him for a fight with evil incarnate.

title: Love is Not Blind
synopsis: After a painful split from her boyfriend of seven years, a heartbroken wedding planner finds support from an unlikely source.

title: The Legend of Bruce Lee
synopsis: The brief but spectacular career of martial arts superstar Bruce Lee is recounted in this drama, starring Danny Chan as the enigmatic and driven Lee.

title: Rumble in Hong Kong
synopsis: A young martial arts master must defend himself and his aging master against wandering bandits who wrongly believe he is a murderer.

title: Empresses in the Palace
synopsis: In 1722 China, betrayal, treachery and corruption torment the women in the imperial harem as they struggle to gain power and the Emperor's favor.

title: Huang jin shi dai
synopsis: The story of writer Xiao Hong comes alive through memories of her great love affair, literary influence and escape from China during World War II.

title: Sky Ladder: The Art of Cai Guo-Qiang
synopsis: Known for his spectacular pyrotechnic displays, Chinese artist Cai Guo-Qiang creates his most ambitious project yet in this breathtaking documentary.

title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
synopsis: A young fighter joins an undercover clan of flying, metal-slinging, magical warriors to save the world from a dark and mystical force.

title: The Stolen Years
synopsis: When a woman wakes up from an accident with amnesia, the ex-husband she doesn't recall divorcing helps her figure out why her life is now in shambles.

title: The Rise of Phoenixes
synopsis: When a secret from the past rears its head, a respected court scholar must choose between avenging her family and staying true to the prince she loves.

title: Finding Mr. Right 2
synopsis: Two people write heartfelt letters to each other from different continents. As feelings intensify, they wonder where, or if, they should connect.

title: A Beautiful Life
synopsis: After meeting under awkward circumstances, a glamorous businesswoman and a tradition-bound policeman begin a relationship that changes their lives.

title: Love O2O
synopsis: When a computer-science major gets dumped by her “husband” in an online role-playing game, she attracts a new proposal from the game’s top player.

title: The Last Supper
synopsis: In director Chuan Lu's sweeping historical parable, a pair of warring generals battle for supremacy in China after the reviled Qin Dynasty is toppled.

title: Meteor Garden
synopsis: Dong Shancai is determined to excel at her dream university, where she encounters an elite clique of dashing, popular high-achievers -- and finds love.

title: Paradise in Service
synopsis: In Taiwan in the late '60s, a young man joins the military on the brink of war and is assigned to Unit 831, where he manages a state-operated brothel.
When an army recruit is found dead, his fellow soldiers are forced to confront a terrifying secret that's haunting their jungle island training camp.

title: Day and Night
synopsis: A detective assists with an investigation into a brutal mass murder case in which his twin brother is the prime suspect.

title: The Precipice Game
synopsis: A carefree young woman joins her boyfriend on a cruise-ship treasure hunt but soon finds herself in a fight for survival when the game turns deadly.

title: Tales From The Dark Part 1
synopsis: These chilling shorts include the tale of a haunted fortuneteller and a man who faces dire consequences after blackmailing grieving families.

title: Ice Fantasy
synopsis: The Ice Tribe prince journeys to a sacred mountain to vanquish evil but soon finds himself at war with the Fire Tribe, led by his long-lost brother.

title: Dear Ex
synopsis: A teen navigates a bitter feud between his willful mom and a free-spirited man, who's the lover and insurance beneficiary of his recently deceased dad.

title: Our Shining Days
synopsis: In a battle of the bands, a percussions student and her musical kindred spirits set out to prove the merits of Chinese folk against the Western canon.

title: Tik Tok
synopsis: A police officer and a psychologist learn of a sinister threat at a highly anticipated soccer match and team up in hopes of preventing disaster.

title: Wind Blast
synopsis: After assassinating a man for money, an underground boxer goes on the lam in the Gobi Desert with his pregnant girlfriend.

title: Tales From The Dark Part 2
synopsis: Hauntings, possession and murder: This compilation features a trio of terrifying shorts from the realm of the supernatural.

title: Beijing Love Story
synopsis: Romance is in the air for everyone, young and old, in these charming, intertwining tales of love found, love lost and love rediscovered.

title: Twenty Two
synopsis: Hundreds of thousands of women were forced into sexual slavery in Japanese-occupied China during World War II. Here, 22 survivors share their stories.

title: 7 Assassins
synopsis: When the government's gold is stolen in ancient China, elite royal guards are sent to reclaim it. They soon learn they aren't alone in their pursuit.

title: Hide and Seek
synopsis: While living a comfortable life with his wife and child, a germophobic man realizes his estranged brother may have committed a terrible crime.

title: The House That Never Dies
synopsis: After moving into a legendary old mansion, a writer is haunted by visions of a ghost from China's Republican Era and uncovers a greater conspiracy.

title: Autumn's Concerto
synopsis: After losing all memories of his past, a wealthy lawyer travels to a rural village where a woman he once loved now lives with her son.

title: King of Peking
synopsis: Strapped for cash, a traveling projectionist begins to run a DVD pirating business, putting him at odds with his young, skeptical son.

title: Be with You
synopsis: After reconnecting with their girlhood crushes, two sisters find their lives turned upside down by surprising revelations and romantic intrigue.

title: You're My Destiny
synopsis: A young woman's romantic cruise ends in a twist when she gets pregnant after a one-night stand with a rich executive, turning their lives upside down.

title: Set Off
synopsis: When a restaurant owner in Cyprus returns to Beijing to sign divorce papers, a drunk woman he encounters triggers a string of mishaps.

title: Secrets in the Hot Spring
synopsis: When three teen outcasts arrive at a hot springs hotel to help run things, creepy incidents prompt comical efforts to find what lurks in their midst.

title: Ashes of Love
synopsis: Hidden away by her mother, the Floral Goddess, the naïve Jinmi is drawn to Xufeng, the Heavenly Emperor's son. Yet forces conspire against them.

title: Just You
synopsis: When her uptight new boss and landlord starts a war on office romances, plucky Liang-liang quickly starts looking for ways to get him to lighten up.

title: Someone to Talk To
synopsis: A man is embittered by a decade-long marriage beset by communication problems, while his sister begins to reflect on her own marriage of convenience.

title: A Boy Name Flora A
synopsis: A 28-year-old layabout begins to re-examine his life when his dysfunctional family assembles to pay respects to a dying grandmother who won’t pass on.

title: A Touch of Green
synopsis: Amid the turmoil of China's civil war, families of Kuomintang pilots face the pain of leaving their homes but find strength in their shared bonds.

title: Up In The Wind
synopsis: A lifestyle journalist on assignment in Nepal encounters a spoiled aristocrat and finds that they're both pondering many of life's big questions.

title: A Journey Through Time with Anthony
synopsis: A young man from Dalian pursues his studies in Melbourne, where he undergoes love, loss and self-discovery in this coming-of-age tale.

title: Close Your Eyes Before Itâ€™s Dark
synopsis: While vacationing at a mountain cabin, a group of longtime friends uncovers an old scandal that could have deadly consequences.

title: Horseplay
synopsis: A reporter, a detective, a thief and a host of rivals clash and double-cross each other while chasing after an antique ceramic horse.

title: Days We Stared at the Sun
synopsis: A model student resorts to violence after witnessing greed and corruption wreak havoc on his life.

title: The Allure of Tears
synopsis: In three bittersweet love stories, couples contend with terminal illness, revisit old dreams and navigate the edge of life and death.

title: Burning Ice
synopsis: While trying to protect a loved one, a white-collar worker is drawn into an intricate murder plot that tests the limits of his will to survive.

title: Bromance
synopsis: Ya-nuo's been raised as a boy. Now at age 25, she's caught the eye of a triad leader's sister. But what happens when she reveals her true gender?

title: Everybody's Fine
synopsis: When his children cancel their visit, a widower travels to the far corners of the country to call on them, discovering the hidden sides of their lives.

title: Office Girls
synopsis: A department store mogul has his son work incognito in a menial job to prove his worthiness, while female co-workers teach him how normal people live.

title: Life plan A and B
synopsis: Two parallel life paths begin for a man and woman in love after she is offered a lucrative promotion far away and must choose between love and career.

title: Take My Brother Away
synopsis: Bickering siblings Shi Miao and Shi Fen tackle friendship matters, school drama and the pitfalls of growing up with little parental supervision.

title: The Prince Who Turns into a Frog
synopsis: Before his wedding, a cold CEO is hit by a car and awakens a changed man. As he and the driver fall in love, more changes appear on the road ahead.

title: Miss Rose
synopsis: Resolving to get married soon, hardworking Si-yi finds love in an unexpected place, but her ex and her job interfere with her plans.

title: Diamond Lover
synopsis: After an accident leads to great weight loss, once-obese Mi Duo embarks on a new life working for her secret crush, diamond company CEO Xiao Liang.

title: The Fierce Wife
synopsis: Beautiful housewife Xie An Zhen seems to be living the perfect life but finds her world crumbling after learning that her husband is cheating on her.

title: Déjà Vu
synopsis: After losing everything, a prima ballerina accepts a stranger's offer to dial back time and reclaim what was taken from her -- but at a great price.

title: One Night Stud
synopsis: A determined architect wants a baby -- but not a man -- and cajoles a dashing TV host into impregnating her. But the truth soon comes out.

title: Queen of No Marriage
synopsis: Sparks begin to fly when a successful 33-year-old single woman and a 25-year-old romantic with few prospects navigate love and differences.

title: Love, Now
synopsis: When her loved ones cook up a morbid plan to make her take time off from work, Yang Yi Ru goes on a vacation, truly believing she has terminal cancer.

title: Love Around
synopsis: After a chance meeting at a ballpark, the kind son of a former gangster tries to help an outgoing radio DJ get over her recent heartbreak.

title: Tientsin Mystic
synopsis: In an otherworldly river town, a policeman follows the trail of a sinister force to save his community from deadly spells.

title: Marry Me, or Not?
synopsis: An ambitious, scheming travel agent's rocky romantic life entangles a divorce lawyer and a frenemy from school.

title: What a Wonderful Family!
synopsis: In a large family living under one roof, a storm brews when the matriarch requests a divorce from her husband on their 50th anniversary.

title: Us and Them
synopsis: Two strangers meet on a train and form a bond that evolves over the years. After a separation, they reconnect and reflect on their love for each other.

title: In Between
synopsis: An author having trouble finishing his new romance novel because he's lost faith in love regains his romantic soul after meeting a flight attendant.

title: The King of Romance
synopsis: Convinced she's the reincarnation of a heroine from legend, a young woman torn between two men sets out to find her star-crossed lover from past lives.

title: Love @ Seventeen
synopsis: Radically changed by a misunderstanding 13 years ago, a biotech expert runs into an old flame and suffers an illness that takes her back to the past.

title: Imperfect
synopsis: After a brawl lands him in a Boys’ Home, a teen seems to be on a promising path until loyalty to his gangster buddy leads to even bigger trouble.

title: Refresh Man
synopsis: Ten years after a once-promising student graduates, she finds herself working at a cosmetics company run by the boy with the worst grades in school.

title: Iron Ladies
synopsis: Three 30-something women in high-level jobs at a beauty e-commerce firm seem to have it all -- except when it comes to love and romantic chemistry.

title: La Femme
synopsis: Personal desires guide the lives of a marriage-averse entrepreneur, a housewife coping with infidelity and a career woman who leaves her spouse.

title: Sudden
synopsis: A car accident sends four lawyers spiraling in different directions as they scramble to rebuild their shattered lives.

title: An Innocent Mistake
synopsis: Raised by three mothers, a self-assured teen in turmoil meets the father figure she never had. But she also stands to drive the man and his son apart.

title: The Year of Happiness and Love
synopsis: Jiang Chen-bo is a loser without prospects for success, until a surprise promotion becomes the catalyst for his entire family's upturn in fortune.

title: Who's The One
synopsis: A doctor performs plastic surgery on a fat man who's been jilted, and continues his transformation by turning him into a handsome, desirable man.

title: A Good Wife
synopsis: As her seemingly idyllic life begins to crumble, a lonely woman in a restrictive marriage starts an affair with a gentle bookstore owner.

title: What She Put on the Table
synopsis: Based on the life of TV chef Fu Pei-mei, this drama follows two women -- one rich, the other poor -- who fortuitously cross paths in 1950s Taiwan.

title: 我最好朋友的婚礼
synopsis: Asked to be her childhood friend's 'best man,' a fashion journalist realizes she secretly loves the groom and hatches a plan to win him back.

title: Qin Empire: Alliance
synopsis: During the Warring States period, Qin state ruler Duke Xiao recruits statesman Shang Yang to help enact bold reforms that transform western China.

title: Best Lover
synopsis: Two young stars with different backgrounds and agendas enter into a fake marriage to advance their careers, until the fake starts turning real.

title: Singles Villa
synopsis: In a luxurious condominium complex with draconian rules forbidding all romance, two residents fall in love and dare to start a secret relationship.

title: Lucky Days
synopsis: When laidback Ren, who is about to divorce his money-crazy wife, finds a time-traveling computer, he decides to use it to reboot his marriage.

title: The Liar
synopsis: At the CARE detective agency, investigators see a lot of action but must always keep their cases secret, even when it affects their personal lives.

title: Game Winning Hit
synopsis: An army deserter hiding out in a small coastal town becomes the coach of a youth baseball team and develops warm relationships in his new community.

title: Be with Me
synopsis: They were the boy band to beat until fame tore them apart. Ten years later, five friends and an ex-love reunite and find themselves closer than ever.

title: The Bittersweet
synopsis: As a killer stalks the streets, a troubled young courier suspects that a doctor may be the long-lost sister he hasn't seen since childhood.

title: When I See You Again
synopsis: On a visit to his hometown, a rich bachelor seeks revenge on the woman who broke his heart 10 years ago. But his plan doesn't go as expected.

title: Love Storm
synopsis: Three grown siblings must rethink their idea of family when they learn their parents are getting divorced and have their eyes on new partners.

title: The Womanizer
synopsis: Libertine He-jie finds himself torn between the lovely Amanda and fiery Xiao-qian. But now he faces a new problem: arrogant rival suitor Cheng-en.

title: Have You Ever Fallen in Love, Miss Jiang?
synopsis: A new teacher finds herself in an unenviable situation after witnessing a troubling interaction between an administrator and a student.

title: Back to 1989
synopsis: A young man who's learned nothing about his father from his single mom has a freak accident that sends him back to 1989, the year before he was born.

title: A House of Blocks
synopsis: Yijuan and her mentally ill sister Kaiqi struggle to be happy in the face of misfortune, criminal intrigue, marital strife, an exorcism and a ghost.

title: All About Love
synopsis: Mysterious ghosts -- determined to reconnect with the living world -- begin to cross over and disrupt the lives of those they left behind.

title: The Beat
synopsis: The artistic pursuits of two childhood friends, an aspiring singer and a talented dancer, lead them to four other 20-somethings in a drumming group.

title: A Taiwanese Tale of Two Cities
synopsis: A Taipei doctor and a San Francisco engineer swap homes in a daring pact, embarking on journeys filled with trials, secrets and unexpected encounters.

title: Exclusive Edition
synopsis: Young journalists working for a magazine juggle careers, romance and other challenges while reporting on social issues and news stories in Malaysia.

title: Timeless Season
synopsis: A decade after college, a wake reunites five female friends struggling with illness, infidelity, toxic in-laws, spousal abuse and other life issues.

title: Glowing Embers
synopsis: Amid Malaysia's charcoal industry, a woman deftly adapts to her environs as she juggles three men in her life: her husband, her lover and her friend.

title: Laws of Attraction
synopsis: Four couples -- a speed-dating pair, a husband and wife, a man living with an older woman and co-workers with opposite views -- weather ups and downs.

title: The Iron Lady
synopsis: After business troubles destroy her father, a headstrong young woman does battle with her deeply patriarchal culture to secure her family's legacy.

title: Age of Glory
synopsis: Amid the thriving nightlife of 1960s Kuala Lumpur, three Chinese friends -- a showgirl, her housekeeper and a chanteuse -- find love and heartbreak.

title: The Adjusters
synopsis: An insurance adjuster investigates cases of possible fraud while hiding a romance with a colleague, unaware that someone he trusts is toying with him.

title: Love Cuisine
synopsis: A successful Taiwanese chef moves home from Europe to teach at a cooking school. He soon clashes with a pretty teacher he met under odd circumstances.

title: Chosen
synopsis: When a mysterious box arrives at his door, a doctor and father is forced to participate in a twisted killing game, or risk losing everything.

title: Wake Up
synopsis: After taking the blame for a patient death, an anesthesiologist battling psychiatric trauma fights to stay afloat in the corrupt hospital system.

title: Forget Me Not
synopsis: Teenage Xue Ming was forced to marry the man who raped her. Years after abandoning her young sons to find a better life, can she escape the guilt?

title: Footprints in the Sand
synopsis: Familial bonds strain as dramas concerning love, greed, business and generosity simmer across generations.

title: Inborn Pair
synopsis: Betrothed while in utero, a resort group president enters into an arranged marriage with a legal assistant. Despite their bickering, love blooms.

title: A Love So Beautiful
synopsis: The ups and downs of school, family and growing up test the affection between a budding artist and her handsome but indifferent classmate and neighbor.

title: Flavorful Origins
synopsis: Delve into the delectable world of Chaoshan cuisine, explore its unique ingredients and hear the stories of the people behind its creation.

title: In Laws
synopsis: Once domineered by her own mother, a well-meaning matriarch has trouble being lax with her children, especially when her daughter-in-law moves in.

title: 海的儿子
synopsis: Two brothers start a new life in Singapore, where they run into a childhood friend who falls in love with the elder while attracting the younger.

title: Goodnight DJ 1
synopsis: Young radio announcers from varying backgrounds encounter the supernatural in mysterious dreams, accidents and everyday life.

title: Dancing Angels
synopsis: A group of aspiring young musicians yearn for stardom while navigating the ups and downs of friendship, romance, and life at school.

title: Pretty Man
synopsis: Doomed by misunderstandings, two middle-school classmates miss their shot at love -- but a twist of fate brings them together years later.

title: On Children
synopsis: These uncanny tales reveal a world where individuals face the tragic consequences of social pressure, parental oppression and family dysfunction.

title: Age of Rebellion
synopsis: At their high school, a group of unruly teens wreak havoc, face bullies and navigate turbulent lives beyond school grounds.

title: Love You
synopsis: Two heartbroken strangers go on a bender and drunkenly elope. After coming to their senses, they try to undo the past 24 hours, but fate intervenes.

title: Shia Wa Se
synopsis: A Taiwan restaurant is like home to its many customers, who love the atmosphere in the family-run business, but the family isn't real at all, for now.

title: Love Me or Leave Me
synopsis: When a marriage-phobic woman hires a seductress to test how faithful her eager-to-wed boyfriend is, her plan takes an unexpected turn.

title: Love Family
synopsis: A wealthy heir's search for a nameless childhood sweetheart leads him to an inn run by a family with three sisters. But which one is his true love?

title: Here to Heart
synopsis: Wen Nuan signs on to work as the executive assistant to ex Zhan Nanxian at his tech firm. Helping him at work just may lead her back into his heart.

title: Eternal Love
synopsis: After the deities Bai Qian and Ye Hua meet and fall in love, their romance stands the test of three lifetimes — each an epic in its own right.

title: The Perfect Match
synopsis: A night market vendor clashes with a lofty celebrity chef in a culinary challenge, fueling the first sparks of a romance.

title: Memory Love
synopsis: Losing her memory -- and her boyfriend -- after a car accident, Jia-en crosses paths with a heart transplant recipient who helps her recall her past.

title: See You in Time
synopsis: A series of mysterious text messages from the future sends ripples through the lives of a delivery woman and an accomplished cyclist.

title: Happy 300 Days
synopsis: An unexpected pregnancy sends a woman back to her hometown to share a house with three nice guys. Each has problems, but each would make a great dad.

title: La Grande Chaumière Violette
synopsis: Reminiscing about his youth in Taiwan's turbulent 1920s, Guo Xuehu reflects on his passion for art, a friendship with a painter -- and a doomed romance.

title: Murphy's Law of Love
synopsis: An online matchmaker who's convinced she's living under a curse finds her theories on life and love tested when she meets a shrewd divorce expert.

title: Lavender
synopsis: Before one of them moves to the U.S., two childhood friends promise to reunite as adults. But illness and the vagaries of the heart stand in the way.

title: Way Back into Love
synopsis: After years in the U.S., a Taiwanese immigrant returns to her hometown with a young daughter in tow to assist her father with his bed-and-breakfast.

title: Easy Fortune Happy Life
synopsis: Years after a wealthy man is healed by a rural herbalist, fate lands him in the same hospital where the woman's granddaughter is treating patients.

title: Accidentally in Love
synopsis: Rejecting the demands of her wealthy family, a young woman poses as an ordinary college student and crosses paths with a stoic pop star at school.

title: Fall in Love with Me
synopsis: The head of a struggling ad agency finds herself torn between a hotshot executive and a kind stranger -- not realizing they're the same person.

title: Ex-Boyfriend
synopsis: Still haunted by the traumatic event that ended her high school romance, a young professional gets a new subordinate: her former sweetheart.

title: Two Fathers
synopsis: When two single guys learn a woman they both slept with disappeared after giving birth, they decide to raise her baby girl together as a family.

title: The New World
synopsis: A woman who wants to reunite with three childhood friends becomes embroiled in events that unwittingly connect them all in political corruption.

title: Prince William
synopsis: Banking on their identical looks, a fish vendor poses as a beleaguered real estate developer, who promises to save his home from demolition in return.

title: Love Cheque Charge
synopsis: Three years after making a wild promise to a woman in distress, a rigid businessman runs into her again and must decide whether to honor his word.

title: Mind Game
synopsis: With the help of a cop, a psychologist and a woman who can foretell the future, a brilliant paralegal works to solve an array of perplexing mysteries.

title: The Dream Job
synopsis: A mysterious, wealthy man offers three people a lucrative, unusual job that may be too good to be true: Live the high life as his children and heirs.

title: The Truth Seekers
synopsis: A veteran cop forms an agency dedicated to solving cold cases, including those related to the team members' own painful and mysterious pasts.

title: Yours Fatefully
synopsis: Two lonely singles meet on a blind date and slowly get to know each other, unaware that their parents are friends and may be falling in love.

title: Yes We Can!
synopsis: When a frustrated businessman starts his own firm, it soon morphs into a way to help senior citizens refresh their dying traditional trades.

title: To the Dearest Intruder
synopsis: Torn between his caring wife and his true love, a successful executive experiences a violent incident that erases part of his memory.

title: Miss in Kiss
synopsis: A quirk of fate sends an ordinary, sweet-natured high school girl and her father into the home of the school genius, on whom she has a huge crush.

title: Love by Design
synopsis: After lying about her age to secure a rookie job at a fashion company, a 34-year-old aspiring designer must cover her tracks or risk getting busted.

title: Someone Like You
synopsis: After losing his sight and his fiancee in an accident, a man hires a caregiver who mysteriously sounds -- and looks -- just like his late girlfriend.

title: Spice Up
synopsis: A spoiled young woman steps in to save her family’s restaurant with her cooking and tasting skills while balancing her complicated love life.

title: Love, Timeless
synopsis: After betraying his beloved, a young man gets a second chance thanks to a clock tower that turns back time.

title: Attention, Love!
synopsis: Fated to be together since birth, a boy and a girl grow up to become polar opposites, but an unlikely bond endures.

title: Jojo's World
synopsis: Diagnosed with a condition that could make her infertile, a career woman must choose one of four bachelors to make a baby with before time runs out.

title: Lion Pride
synopsis: After crossing paths at a crime scene, a renowned math teacher and an antiques appraiser embark on an unexpected journey of love and self-discovery.

title: Single Ladies Senior
synopsis: Four best friends and spirited career women navigate the treacherous world of romance -- even as it stands in the way of work and friendship.

title: World At Your Feet
synopsis: A group of struggling individuals are united by a love of soccer. At the center is Renxin, a reclusive widower and former coach who needs new hope.

title: King’s War
synopsis: In 210 B.C., during the upheaval following the death of Emperor Qin, insurgent warriors Xiang Yu and Liu Bang fight for control of the Chinese empire.

title: Lang Tong
synopsis: After seducing a philandering con man, a rebellious young woman enlists his help in carrying out a heinous crime against her sister.

title: What Is Love?
synopsis: A 32-year-old romantic looking for a long-term, monogamous relationship meets a handsome bad boy who only believes in one-night stands.
